titleStmt.title: A declaration and protestation against the illegal, detestable, oft-condemned, new tax and extortion of excise in general; and for hops (a native incertain commodity) in particular. By William Prynne of Swainswick, Esq;
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Edward Thomas in Green-Arbor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
